TopicTitle: Where is the download link on this website

Articles.Content:
I feel like a huge idiot for not finding the download link for the ships on this website,

 

Here is the link to the website

 

https://www.reddit.com/r/KerbalSpaceProgram/comments/1eifwl/stock_15_star_wars_ships_finally_with_craft_files/

MediaFire link 3rd (2nd? not sure how Reddit post counts work) post down by phoenix_nz. Those are banned on the forums, so you'll have to find it by yourself.

Also, considering the topic is 2 years old, chances are it will not work on KSP most recent versions.

Edited January 18, 2016 by Gaarst

That link works just fine. If the craft still work that's a whole other matter indeed.

Edited January 18, 2016 by Tex_NL
You're not the only one baffled by stupid reddit.com

55 minutes ago, lajoswinkler said:

You're not the only one baffled by stupid reddit.com

What I am baffled about is that people can't find THE ONLY LINK IN THE ENTIRE FREAKING LIST OF REACTIONS !!!
Sometimes there's a whole thread of replies, with several links. I don't want to sift through all of it. I hate reddit's layout profoundly and I can't help myself.
